verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>
"Take<WH5375> a census<WH7218> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> from among<WH8432> the sons<WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004>

from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> even until fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> all who enter<WH935> into the service,<WH6635> to do<WH6213> the work<WH4399> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>
"This is the service<WH5656> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> the most<WH6944> holy things.<WH6944>

When the camp<WH4264> moves forward,<WH5265> Aaron<WH175> shall go in,<WH935> and his sons,<WH1121> and they shall take down<WH3381> the veil<WH6532> of the screen,<WH4539> and cover<WH3680> the ark<WH727> of the Testimony with it,<WH5715>

and shall put<WH5414> a covering<WH3681> of<WH8476> sealskin<WH5785> on it,<WH6566> and shall spread over<WH4605> it a cloth<WH899> all<WH3632> of blue,<WH8504> and shall put<WH7760> in its poles.<WH905>

"On the table<WH7979> of show bread<WH6440> they shall spread<WH6566> a blue<WH8504> cloth,<WH899> and put<WH5414> on it the dishes,<WH7086> the spoons,<WH3709> the bowls,<WH4518> and the cups<WH7184> with which<WH5262> to pour out;<WH8548> and the continual bread shall be on it.<WH3899>
They shall spread<WH6566> on them a scarlet<WH8438> cloth,<WH899> and cover<WH3680> the same with a covering<WH4372> of<WH8476> sealskin,<WH5785> and shall put<WH7760> in its poles.<WH905>

"They shall take<WH3947> a blue<WH8504> cloth,<WH899> and cover<WH3680> the lampstand<WH4501> of the light,<WH3974> and its lamps,<WH5216> and its snuffers,<WH4457> and its snuff dishes,<WH4289> and all its oil<WH8081> vessels,<WH3627> with which they minister to it.<WH8334>
They shall put<WH5414> it and all its vessels<WH3627> within a covering<WH4372> of<WH8476> sealskin,<WH5785> and shall put<WH5414> it on the frame.<WH4132>

"On the golden<WH2091> altar<WH4196> they shall spread<WH6566> a blue<WH8504> cloth,<WH899> and cover<WH3680> it with a covering<WH4372> of<WH8476> sealskin,<WH5785> and shall put<WH7760> in its poles.<WH905>

"They shall take<WH3947> all the vessels<WH3627> of ministry,<WH8335> with which they minister<WH8334> in the sanctuary,<WH6944> and put<WH5414> them in a blue<WH8504> cloth,<WH899> and cover<WH3680> them with a covering<WH4372> of<WH8476> sealskin,<WH5785> and shall put<WH5414> them on the frame.<WH4132>
"They shall take away the ashes<WH1878> from the altar,<WH4196> and spread<WH6566> a purple<WH713> cloth on it.<WH899>

They shall put<WH5414> on it all its vessels,<WH3627> with which they minister<WH8334> about it,<WH4289> the fire pans, the flesh hooks,<WH4207> the shovels,<WH3257> and the basins;<WH4219> all the vessels<WH3627> of the altar;<WH4196> and they shall spread<WH6566> on it a covering<WH3681> of<WH8476> sealskin,<WH5785> and put<WH7760> in its poles.<WH905>

"When Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> have finished<WH3615> covering<WH3680> the sanctuary,<WH6944> and all the furniture<WH3627> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> as the camp<WH4264> moves forward;<WH5265> after<WH310> that,<WH1121> the sons of Kohath<WH6955> shall come<WH935> to carry<WH5375> it:<WH5060> but they shall not touch the sanctuary,<WH6944> lest they die.<WH4191> These things are the burden<WH4853> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>

"The duty<WH6486> of Eleazar<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> shall be the oil<WH8081> for the light,<WH3974> the sweet<WH5561> incense,<WH7004> the continual<WH8548> meal offering,<WH4503> and the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> the requirements<WH6486> of all the tabernacle,<WH4908> and of all that is in it,<WH6944> the sanctuary, and its furnishings.<WH3627>"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>
"Don't<WH3772> cut off the tribe<WH7626> of the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites<WH6956> from among<WH8432> the Levites;<WH3881>

but thus do<WH6213> to them,<WH2421> that they may live, and not die,<WH4191> when they approach<WH5066> to the most<WH6944> holy things:<WH6944> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall go in,<WH935> and appoint<WH7760> them<WH376> everyone<WH376> to his service<WH5656> and to his burden;<WH4853>
but they shall not go in<WH935> to see<WH7200> the sanctuary<WH6944> even for a moment,<WH1104> lest they die.<WH4191>"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Take<WH5375> a census<WH7218> of the sons<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1648> also,<WH1> by their fathers' houses,<WH1004> by their families;<WH4940>

you shall count<WH6485> them from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> until fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old;<WH1121> all who enter in<WH935> to wait<WH6633> on the service,<WH6635> to do<WH5647> the work<WH5656> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>
"This is the service<WH5656> of the families<WH4940> of the Gershonites,<WH1649> in serving and in bearing burdens:<WH4853>

they shall carry<WH5375> the curtains<WH3407> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> and the Tent<WH4908> of Meeting,<WH4150> its covering,<WH4372> and the covering<WH4372> of sealskin<WH8476> that is above<WH4605> on it,<WH4539> and the screen for the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150>

and the hangings<WH7050> of the court,<WH2691> and the screen<WH4539> for the door<WH6607> of the gate<WH8179> of the court,<WH2691> which is by the tabernacle<WH4908> and around<WH5439> the altar,<WH4196> and their cords,<WH4340> and all the instruments<WH3627> of their service,<WH5656> and whatever shall be done<WH6213> with them.<WH5647> Therein shall they serve.

At the commandment<WH6310> of Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall be all the service<WH5656> of the sons<WH1121> of the Gershonites,<WH1649> in all their burden,<WH4853> and in all their service;<WH5656> and you shall appoint<WH6485> their duty<WH4931> to them in all their responsibilities.<WH4853>

This is the service<WH5656> of the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of the Gershonites<WH1649> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting:<WH4150> and their duty<WH4931> shall be under the hand<WH3027> of Ithamar<WH385> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest.<WH3548>
"As for the sons<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> you shall number<WH6485> them by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers<WH1>' houses;<WH1004>

you shall count<WH6485> them from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> even to fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> everyone who enters<WH935> on the service,<WH6635> to do<WH5647> the work<WH5656> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>

This is the duty<WH4931> of their burden,<WH4853> according to all their service<WH5656> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting:<WH4150> the tabernacle<WH168>'s boards,<WH7175> its bars,<WH1280> its pillars,<WH5982> its sockets,<WH134>

and the pillars<WH5982> of the court<WH2691> around<WH5439> it,<WH134> and their sockets, and their pins,<WH3489> and their cords,<WH4340> with all their instruments,<WH3627> and with all their service:<WH5656> and by name<WH8034> you shall appoint<WH6485> the instruments<WH3627> of the duty<WH4931> of their burden.<WH4853>

This is the service<WH5656> of the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> according to all their service,<WH5656> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> under the hand<WH3027> of Ithamar<WH385> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest.<WH3548>"

Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> and the princes<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> numbered<WH6485> the sons<WH1121> of the Kohathites<WH6956> by their families,<WH4940> and by their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004>

from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> even to fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> everyone who entered<WH935> into the service,<WH6635> for work<WH5656> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>
Those who were numbered<WH6485> of them by their families<WH4940> were two thousand<WH505> seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> fifty.<WH2572>

These are those who were numbered<WH6485> of the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites,<WH6956> all who served<WH5647> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> whom Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> numbered<WH6485> according to the commandment<WH6310> of Yahweh<WH3068> by<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>
Those who were numbered<WH6485> of the sons<WH1121> of Gershon,<WH1648> their families,<WH4940> and by their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004>

from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> even to fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> everyone who entered<WH935> into the service,<WH6635> for work<WH5656> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150>
even those who were numbered<WH6485> of them,<WH4940> by their families, by their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004> were two thousand<WH505> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> thirty.<WH7970>

These are those who were numbered<WH6485> of the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Gershon,<WH1648> all who served<WH5647> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> whom Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> numbered<WH6485> according to the commandment<WH6310> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
Those who were numbered<WH6485> of the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004>

from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> even to fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> everyone who entered<WH935> into the service,<WH6635> for work<WH5656> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150>
even those who were numbered<WH6485> of them by their families,<WH4940> were three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> two hundred.<WH3967>

These are those who were numbered<WH6485> of the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> whom Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> numbered<WH6485> according to the commandment<WH6310> of Yahweh<WH3068> by<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>

All those who were numbered<WH6485> of the Levites,<WH3881> whom Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> and the princes<WH5387> of Israel<WH3478> numbered,<WH6485> by their families,<WH4940> and by their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004>

from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> even to fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> everyone who entered<WH935> in to do<WH5647> the work<WH5656> of service,<WH5656> and the work of bearing burdens<WH4853> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150>
even those who were numbered<WH6485> of them,<WH8083> were eight thousand<WH505> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> eighty.<WH8084>

According to the commandment<WH6310> of Yahweh<WH3068> they were numbered<WH6485> by<WH3027> Moses,<WH4872> everyone<WH376> according to his service,<WH5656> and according to his burden.<WH4853> Thus were they numbered<WH6485> by him,<WH3068> as Yahweh commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
